text: Dmitri Ivanovich Butaliy (; born 23 June 1976) is a former Russian football player. His father Ivan Butaliy is a football coach. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Association football defenders
title: Dmitri Butaliy
